version_description:
Brand new UI, new configuration, bring you a new experience:
1.UI revision;
2.official configuration optimization;
3.part of the bug repair, internal optimization.

1.New UI And Control;
2.Fun configuration Waiting for you to play;
3.fix some bugs.

中文：
1.全新UI,全新操控；
2.好玩的构型，等你来玩；
3.修复部分bug。

1. Fix bugs at binding modules
2. When you are logging in/registering, you should select the region you are in.

1。修复绑定模块中的错误
2。当你登录/注册时，你应该选择你所在的区域。

1.添加应用内可以修改语言；
2.添加bug收集接口，了解用户使用情况
3.修复软件bug，优化蓝牙传输

1. you can update your app language .
2. add the bug collection interface to understand the user usage
3. repair software bug, optimize Bluetooth transmission

1.fix wheel bug
2.Improving and optimizing program
翻译：
1.修复全是轮子的崩溃bug
2.改善优化内部程序
